sample_docs: English Deutsch Español TECHNICAL INTEGRATIONS Tap Into One of Our Integrations ✓Stand out with a game-changing wallet pass integration ✓ Expand the capabilities of your wallet pass ✓ Create better customer experiences FEATURED INTEGRATION Yotpo With Yotpo, you can build customized rewards & referrals programs to engage existing customers and reach new ones. Distribute digital loyalty cards via Passcreator to allocate and redeem points in-store. With our Yotpo integration, you can distribute tiered digital loyalty cards directly to your customer's smartphone. Customers can see their points update live on their wallet pass and access their points hub directly from their pass. FEATURED INTEGRATION Streamboxy With Streamboxy, make hybrid events seamless for you and your attendees. You'll be able to do the following: Manage attendees, enable on-site check-ins, view live tracking and reports, and engage with attendees before, during and after the event. Zapier Integrations With Passcreator, you can plug into any one of these integrations to create seamless customer experiences. Ready to Get Started? Registration and Check-in With our registration and check-in module, outdated, resource-heavy, manual processes are a thing of the past. Automate the entire registration, ticketing, and check-in process for venues, conferences, and their attendees. Fobi's system modernizes conferences and events with sleek guest experiences, fast contactless check-ins, and analytics to make every event a success. Save time and money every step of the way From landing pages and ticketing to check-ins and event analytics, Fobi's got you covered with our end-to-end system. Reallocate the time and money saved on the registration and check-in process to elevate guest experiences throughout the conference. Create sleek and speedy guest experiences Fobi digitizes guest experiences and conference operations by eliminating manual processes with our Smart Tap and Wallet pass technology. Combine ID badges, check-ins, event notifications, and more in one digital Wallet pass. Leverage session analytics to make every event a hit Fobi provides real-time updates and analytics in our Portal on attendance and popularity so you can understand which speakers, booths, or networking sessions attracted the most attendance and engagement. How it works Step 1 Register online Attendees register for the conference online - just as they typically do. Step 2 Install the App-less Fobi Wallet pass Once registered, attendees are automatically sent a link via email and/or SMS to download their Fobi Wallet pass to the native wallet on their Mobile device. Step 3 NFC enabled check-in Instead of waiting in line to , attendees can simply tap their Wallet pass on our SmarT Tap device. Step 4 Real-time verification Fobi records guest attendance and immediately sends that information to the printer and the analytics Portal. Our platform gives you the ability to accurately segment and measure visitors, and manage access across multi-day events. Step 5 Automated ID printing Upon verification, the Fobi connected printer will automatically print out the guest's corresponding ID badge. Step 6 Monitor Session Attendance Once inside the event, additional SmarTap devices can be deployed at VIP areas, booths, auditoriums, etc. to record/monitor session attendance. Pricing One-Time Event License $3,000.00 one-time flat fee + $1.00 per user/day Set the foundation with everything your conference needs to be fully digitized and automated from registration to check-in. Smart Tap & Printer set up & configuration guides 3 Smart Tap devices 3 ID badge printers Access to Fobi's Portal: your personalized analytics dashboard Custom registration landing page for Wallet pass onboarding Annual Event License $10,000.00 billed annually + $1.00 per user/day For organizations with more than one event, have the tools to digitize and automate everything from registration to check-in for every event. Smart Tap & Printer set up & configuration guides 3 Smart Tap devices 3 ID badge printers Access to Fobi's Portal: your personalized analytics dashboard Custom registration landing page for Wallet pass onboarding Additional Smart Tap Devices $200.00 per Smart Tap Make the most out of your conference with additional Smart Tap devices to track the attendance and popularity of every speaker, booth, or networking session. Additional Smart Tap Devices & ID Printers $300.00 per Smart Tap & Printer For large conferences in need of more entry check-in points, Fobi's system scales to match the size of your event with additional Smart Taps and Printers. FACT SHEET Venue Management For Conferences & Events: Registration and Check-in Download our fact sheet and see how our services can work for you. About the World Boxing Council The World Boxing Council (WBC) is one of four major organizations which sanctions professional boxing bouts. The World Boxing Council is an organization that is motivated by the love for boxing with dedicated, loyal people who seek to safeguard the safety of boxers. Consisting of 166 countries with their respective confederations, its main function is to make boxing a fair and safe sport. Many historically high-profile bouts have been sanctioned by the organization with various notable fighters having been recognised as WBC world champions. About the World Boxing Council The World Boxing Council (WBC) is one of four major organizations which sanctions professional boxing bouts. The World Boxing Council is an organization that is motivated by the love for boxing with dedicated, loyal people who seek to safeguard the safety of boxers. Consisting of 166 countries with their respective confederations, its main function is to make boxing a fair and safe sport. Many historically high-profile bouts have been sanctioned by the organization with various notable fighters having been recognised as WBC world champions. Leading up to and throughout fight night, Fobi engaged with fans using the WBC Fan Pass. Fobi provided: WBC Fan Pass developed & launched for the Canelo vs. Yildirim fight 4 Days to Execute -Pass, landing page & onboarding design and development -Social and email distribution strategy -Social marketing strategy and assets 2 Day Campaign -Fully managed notifications, promotions, and engagement -Help desk Leading up to and on fight night, Fobi engaged with fans using the WBC Fan Pass. 55% onboarded through CRM 45% onboarded through Social Engagement Fobi's World Boxing Council wallet passes greatly out performed average mobile applications in engagement and retention. Fobi's World Boxing Council Wallet Pass greatly outperformed average mobile application in engagement and fan retention. Pass Retention Rate = 89% Uninstall Rate = 11% Average Wallet Pass Promotion CTR = 37% Device Breakdown = 66% iOS | 34% Android *CTR = Click Through Rate Leading up to and throughout fight night, Fobi asked fans to predict the results of the night's featured bout through the WBC Fan Pass. Fobi created an interactive questionnaire that got fans to predict who would and how they would win. In the lead up to the fight poll, the results were shared. Through the Fobi Wallet Pass, sponsored ads were sent and tracked in real-time to drive engagement and increased revenue. Fobi provided Van Isle Beauty Co. with a digital wallet pass platform to revamp the boutique's membership and loyalty program, driving revenue through increased frequency of customer visits and spend, cross-selling opportunities, and purchases through loyalty-based rewards. Vend + Fobi Extend the power of Vend from your stores to head office with Fobi Fobi makes managing and analyzing your business performance easier by consolidating data across multiple Vend accounts. Your teams can spend less time exporting and merging data, and more time scaling and growing the business. Standard $35 /mo per register Up to 50 registers For small to medium single or multi-location businesses Consolidate results from different Vend accounts, countries, and business units Real-time SKU, basket, loyalty, transaction, location, time & more insights Predictive AI forecasting Demographic & loyalty insights Segmented permission-based access Upload and sync historical data from previous POS systems Exportable reporting Enterprise Contact us for a quote Over 50 registers Fobi's solution for large multi-location and franchise businesses. Customizable insight dashboard and reporting 3rd party data integrations (weather, traffic, etc) Designated marketing, sales, & customer support teams Multi language and currency support Franchise compliance Consolidate results from different Vend accounts, countries, and business units Real-time SKU, basket, loyalty, transaction, location, time & more insights Predictive AI forecasting Demographic and loyalty insights Segmented permission-based access Upload and sync historical data from previous POS systems Exportable Reporting Save time – Vend and Fobi provide real-time aggregated online and in-store data from across multiple Vend domains. No need to export and consolidate data, see it all in one place. Real-time reporting – Take the guesswork out of decision making with powerful micro and macro level real-time reporting across all domains. Make informed business decisions with aggregate retail metrics including in-store and online sales, sell-through rates, and much more. Grow and scale – View your sales history and year over year growth across your full business operations to help forecast and plan the future of your business with AI data forecasting and segmentation. Key Features Multi-domain reporting – Consolidate results from different Vend accounts, countries, and business units into a unified view Franchise compliance – View, manage and edit products, pricing, and discounts from Fobi and cascade updates to associated Vend accounts Reporting access – Vend's user permissions have the flexibility to cater to your in-store operations, Fobi extends that flexibility with a tool built for management and head office operations Historical performance and 3rd party data – Upload and sync your historical data from previous POS systems. Integrate a range of 3rd party data, such as weather, traffic, stock levels, and more. FACT SHEET How we help Vend retailers Download the fact sheet to about how we connect retailers with their data and deliver real-time insights. Download TESTIMONIALS What our customers say "There's no greater time to utilize top-tier artificial intelligence technology to gain an edge in this industry. Our customer base is huge, and it's important to understand their needs and preferences to maximize basket size, loyalty, and wallet share. We look forward to working with Fobi and building unparalleled experiences for our customers." About Van Isle Beauty Co. Van Isle Beauty Co. is a beauty and health boutique who offers a range of salon products and services including spa treatments, massage therapy, and cosmetic procedures for clients across Canada. With a focus on providing world-class experiences in the salon and at home, Van Isle Beauty also offers aspiring beauty professionals hands-on, educational courses to kickstart their careers in the Beauty and Health industry. From eyelash extensions and hair care to hydra facials and teeth whitening, Van Isle Beauty champions an empowering brand that creates, serves, and sells from the heart to provide clients with unmatched quality, competitive pricing, and guaranteed results. About Van Isle Beauty Co. Van Isle Beauty Co. is a beauty and health boutique who offers a range of salon products and services including spa treatments, massage therapy, and cosmetic procedures for clients across Canada. With a focus on providing world-class experiences in the salon and at home, Van Isle Beauty also offers aspiring beauty professionals hands-on, educational courses to kickstart their careers in the Beauty and Health industry. From eyelash extensions and hair care to hydra facials and teeth whitening, Van Isle Beauty champions an empowering brand that creates, serves, and sells from the heart to provide clients with unmatched quality, competitive pricing, and guaranteed results. Keeping Clients Coming Back Having seen significant growth to their client base and service offerings, Van Isle Beauty Co. was in search of an easy-to-use platform that delivered a seamless customer experience as a part of their new membership and loyalty program, Van Isle Beauty Club. With the goal to provide feel-good experiences that encourage clients to regularly return to the salon, and collecting rewards when they do, Fobi's digital loyalty solution seemed well-fit for the job. Securing a much-coveted exclusive agreement with InLei Canada, an Italian manufacturer of lash and brow products, it was critical that the new solution not only increased Van Isle Beauty's customer retention and engagement, but also achieved greater adoption and awareness for Inlei's services as well. "In a salon, the most important thing is to make our customers feel special and familiar with our estheticians, services, and products. The personalization and direct communication of Fobi's Wallet Pass platform solves exactly that. It gives our most important clients a sense of exclusivity, belonging, and recognition while using an up-scale solution." A Breath of Fresh (H)Air Fobi provided Van Isle Beauty with a highly compatible and easy-to-use Wallet Pass platform that seamlessly integrated into their existing business systems, enabling the brand to send personalized messaging to clients more efficiently than ever before. Thanks to the new digital loyalty solution, Van Isle can immediately target its Beauty Club members before, during, and after their appointments with new offers and promotions, which will drive revenue through increased frequency of visits, cross-selling opportunities, and purchases through loyalty-based rewards. Similarly, Van Isle Beauty can now also send targeted promotions to clients who attend appointments for InLei eyelash extensions, and provide subsequent information that educates them on complementary InLei products such as brow serums and lash fillers. With the ability to collect transactional data from each appointment and customer interaction, Van Isle's segmented communication through the Wallet Pass forges the personal relationships that every business strives for and encourages customers to come back regularly. Explore Other Wallet Pass Success Stories bdG Sports needed a platform that could seamlessly segment, manage, and analyze targeted advertising campaigns before, during, and after each tournament. Through the Fobi Wallet Pass, sponsored ads were sent and tracked in real-time to drive engagement and increased revenue. With four days to execute, Fobi provided the World Boxing Council (WBC) with an integrated Wallet Pass platform to engage with fans during the Super Middleweight Championship fight featuring Avni Yildirim and champion Saul "Canelo" Álvarez at the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami.
